thread.title: Justin Bieber Mumbai concert: Varun, Alia and Sidharth likely to attend; tickets go on sale today
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Mumbai concert: Varun, Alia and Sidharth likely to attend; tickets go on sale today

author: FP Staff
title: Justin Bieber Mumbai concert: Varun, Alia and Sidharth likely to attend; tickets go on sale today
text:
Justin Bieber Mumbai concert: Varun, Alia and Sidharth likely to attend; tickets go on sale today FP Staff Feb, 22 2017 11:01:06 IST #Alia bhatt #Badrinath ki dulhaniya #Justin bieber #Sidharth malhotra #Varun dhawan 
You will never guess which Bollywood celebrity is a belieber. 
Varun Dhawan announced his excitement over Justin Bieber coming to India during the promotion of his upcoming film Badrinath Ki Dulhaniya and confirmed his presence at the concert, which is being held at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai on 10 May. He also wants the Canadian popstar to watch his upcoming rom-com with Alia Bhatt, reports Newsnation . 
A source has also told Mid-day that Varun Dhawan's friends' Alia Bhatt and Sidharth Malhotra might be attending the concert as well. The source said, "..they are not allowed to talk about it until the terms are finalised. We thought of Varun, Sidharth and Alia since they represent the youth. The plan is to make them dance and mimic as well." 
Arjun Jain, Director, White Fox India states, "We have already received confirmations from some of the biggest celebrities of India for the concert and will try to definitely integrate indigenous factors including Bollywood and cricket as part of the event." 
The tickets for the concert will go on sale today, 22 February on BookMyShow. 
After paying exorbitant prices watching Coldplay perform in Mumbai last November, now we have Bieber's concert tickets competing with it. The pre-registration tickets on BookMyShow are priced from 4,060 and the most expensive tickets priced at 76,690 which promises you a backstage tour and a premium merchandise package among other things. The pre-registration ticket prices for the Bieber concert. Image Courtesy: Twitter The pre-registration ticket prices for the Bieber concert. Image Courtesy:Twitter 
Ofcourse, the twitterati in Mumbai commented on the ticket prices: Justin Bieber Mumbai concert ticket : rs 76000 Watching Gujaratis doing garba on Baby at party grounds of Malad: Priceless 
— Kru ⭐ (@Achari_Nimboo) February 21, 2017 
Justin Bieber concert tickets cost as much as 25,000 ₹. You can hear kids singing better in Mumbai local for free. — Pakchikpak Raja Babu (@HaramiParindey) February 21, 2017 This just in. Tickets for @justinbieber 's Bombay concert are priced from Rs. 4060 all the way upto Rs. 76,790. 
Best of luck selling those. pic.twitter.com/diLxexmGYz
